scenario.title: Sanrio Characters Collection
scenario.description: A curated list of beloved Sanrio characters with their descriptions and images.

characters.name: Hello Kitty
characters.description: A cheerful and kind-hearted girl who loves baking cookies and making new friends.

characters.name: My Melody
characters.description: A sweet-natured girl who always wears a red or pink hood that covers her ears.

characters.name: Cinnamoroll
characters.description: A shy but friendly puppy with big ears that enable him to fly.

characters.name: Badtz-Maru
characters.description: A mischievous little penguin with a spiky hairdo and a bit of an attitude.

characters.name: Keroppi
characters.description: An energetic frog who loves adventure and playing games with friends.

characters.name: Chococat
characters.description: A curious black cat with a keen sense of curiosity and a love for technology.

characters.name: Pompompurin
characters.description: A laid-back golden retriever who loves wearing his brown beret and eating pudding.

characters.name: Kuromi
characters.description: A punky girl with a mischievous personality and a black jester's hat.

characters.name: Little Twin Stars
characters.description: Kiki and Lala are twin stars who traveled to Earth to learn how to be the best, shiniest stars they can be.

characters.name: Pochacco
characters.description: A sporty and playful dog who loves basketball and going on walks.
